description: A name used in some unit organs for a 16' string stop. Irwin says: �It is likely to be orchestral in voicing. This name is also used for the Bass Violin stop.� Strony reports that in some instruments it is an extension of the Solo String.
examplesDescription: Double String 16 (TC), Great; John Ledwon residence, Agoura, California, USA; various builders.
